parameters.name: ImageId
parameters.description: The ID of the image. Fuzzy search is supported.

parameters.name: ImageName
parameters.description: The name of the image. Fuzzy search is supported.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to return. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Default value: 10.
